argparser.name: argparser
argparser.description: Select the argument parser for training

nproc_per_node.name: nproc_per_node
nproc_per_node.description: Number of processes to launch on each node (mandatory for single node, multi gpus distributed training)

nnodes.name: nnodes
nnodes.description: Number of nodes to use for distributed training (mandatory for multi nodes, multi gpus distributed training)

master_addr.name: master_addr
master_addr.description: Master node TCP/IP address for torch native backends (mandatory if you have filled number of nodes)

master_port.name: master_port
master_port.description: Master node port for torch native backends (mandatory if you have filled number of nodes)

save_training.name: save_training
save_training.description: Save the training state (models, optimizers, trainers, ...).

save_evaluation.name: save_evaluation
save_evaluation.description: Save the model(s) by best evaluation metric score.

terminate_on_nan.name: terminate_on_nan
terminate_on_nan.description: Stop the training if there is Inf/NaN tensor found.

timer.name: timer
timer.description: Measure (average) time between events using Timer handler.

patience.name: patience
patience.description: Number of events to wait if no improvement and then stop the training.

filename_prefix.name: filename_prefix
filename_prefix.description: What prefix would you like to put in front of saved checkpoint file? (mandatory for saving training states)

save_every_iters.name: save_every_iters
save_every_iters.description: Iteration interval for saving training states (mandatory for saving training states)

n_saved.name: n_saved
n_saved.description: How many checkpoint file would you like to keep on disk? (mandatory for saving both training and evaluation)

limit_sec.name: limit_sec
limit_sec.description: How long do you want to run for the training and then terminate? (in seconds)

output_dir.name: output_dir
output_dir.description: Directory to save all outputs (including checkpoints, logs)
